first_translate: I thought I’d die waiting for you.
but may I ask who you are?
didn’t think you wouldn’t know my name.
no, so tell me your name.

hangle: 대신 죽은 땅에서 도움이 될 만한 똥개를 하나 보내마.
first_translate: since we can’t send any guards from house halyeon, we’ll have someone else accompany us instead.

hangle: 아벨 자식… 날 대체 뭐라고 소개한 거야.
first_translate: abel! what exactly did you tell them about me?
a real dog is at least cute...
why on earth do they want me to take such a scary man along?
now does that ring a bell?
it came back to me now!
in the original story, there was a character called “the king of mercenaries.”
though his role wasn’t very significant.

hangle: 굳이 따지자면 조연과 서브남의 중간 정도.
first_translate: if anything, he played more like a supporting male lead than just another minor character.

hangle: 잠시간 유니스의 호위를 맡다가 사랑에 빠졌던가.
first_translate: for some time, he worked as eunice’s bodyguard before falling in love with her.

hangle: 이 타이밍에 권터와 만나게 될 줄은 몰랐네?
first_translate: I didn’t expect to meet him again at this point in time.
lady fiona, I’ve heard quite a bit about you.

hangle: 몇 년 전에 헤일론에 잠깐 있었던 적이 있거든.
first_translate: I stayed at halyeon castle several years ago.
so you met each other before?

hangle: 유감스럽게도 아가씨는 나에 대한 소문조차 못 들은 모양이지만.
first_translate: unfortunately though, lady fiona doesn’t seem to recall hearing those stories.
why are you sweating so much?
did you run all the way here?
there could’ve been strange men lurking around.
looks like you got lucky, siegren.
the duke threatened me into coming here anyway...
lady fiona, if you don’t need me anymore,

hangle: 이번에 황궁에서 죽은 땅에 가라고 했거든.
first_translate: the royal palace ordered me to go to the land of death recently.

hangle: 내가 헤일론 기사와 병사를 빼가면 그만큼 저택 경비에 구멍이 생기잖아.
first_translate: but taking knights or soldiers away will leave our estate vulnerable.
to the land of death? why must you go there?
at the time, I had no idea...
...would volunteer himself to become commander-in-chief of the troops.
I knew he cared deeply about me,
but never expected him to actually do something like that.

hangle: 그나저나, 당신은 후열에 가도 되지 않아?
first_translate: anyway, shouldn’t you move toward the rear?
even though I get to ride in the middle thanks to eunice,
aren’t you supposed to be the king of mercenaries?
I came here to escort you first.
hmm... looks like you’re pretty diligent after all.

hangle: 권터, 공작님이 당신을 어떻게 협박했는지 물어도 돼?
first_translate: gunter, am I allowed to ask how the duke blackmailed you?
let's just say I killed one nobleman,
and the duke covered up the incident for me.
if I were to make excuses,

hangle: 아녀자를 납치해서 끔찍한 짓을 저지른 쓰레기였다.
first_translate: this guy kidnapped women and committed unspeakable crimes against them.
when the victim tried to kill herself out of despair,

hangle: 아무리 봐도 죽을 사람은 피해자가 아니라 내가 나섰지.
first_translate: I stepped forward since she seemed closer to dying than anyone else.
and then the duke helped cover everything up?

hangle: 당신이 선택한 일인데 타인의 평가가 필요해?
first_translate: should others’ opinions matter when you made the choice yourself?
I understand now why siegren acts so nervously around you.
what do you mean by that...?

hangle: 황자 전하를 대접하게 되어 무한한 영광입니다.
first_translate: it is an honor to serve prince bernhart.
an honor to meet you, your highness.

hangle: 자, 피곤하실 테니 바로 방으로 안내해드리겠습니다.
…오늘은 피오나와 제대로 대화 한 번 못했군.
first_translate: I couldn’t even talk properly with fiona today...
I guess I'll just have to ask whether I can kiss her.
where might you be heading off to at this hour?
what business do you have with me?
would you care to spend tonight...
